Burst of yellow a few days ago, surprised me as the buds seemed to open overnight. I tend not to value yellow as other colors, but this is growing on me.

[Hibbertia empetrifolia](https://plantdatabase.nativeplantscbr.com.au/plants/hibbertia-empetrifolia/).
